processing_summary.validation_notes: Equal priority given to all basketball events - assists, steals, blocks, shots

detailed_events.description: Player in green jersey receives a pass under the basket and scores an immediate layup towards the far basket - made shot.
Player in green jersey makes a quick pass to a teammate cutting to the basket, who scores within 2 seconds - assist recorded.
detailed_events.players_involved: Passer in green jersey, Scorer in green jersey

detailed_events.description: Player in red jersey #5 attempts a layup in traffic towards the far basket, which misses off the backboard.
Player in red jersey makes a short jump hook in the paint towards the far basket - made shot.
Player in green jersey strips the ball from an opponent in a red jersey during a dribble near the top of the key - steal recorded.
detailed_events.players_involved: Defender in green jersey, Dribbler in red jersey

detailed_events.description: Player in red jersey attempts a layup towards the far basket, which is blocked by a defender in a white jersey.
detailed_events.players_involved: Shooter in red jersey, Blocker in white jersey

detailed_events.description: Player in white jersey jumps and clearly deflects a layup attempt by a player in a red jersey - block recorded.
detailed_events.players_involved: Blocker in white jersey, Shooter in red jersey

detailed_events.description: Player in a red jersey makes a running floater from near the free-throw line towards the far basket - made shot.
